product_name: Rossignol Fun Girl J3 Ski Boots - Junior Girls' - 2012/2013
long_description: Rossignol Fun Girl J3 junior girls' ski boots provide a comfortable fit and basic performance features for young skiers developing their skills. Anatomic inner boots conform to the shape of kids' feet, ensuring all-day comfort. Bi-injected polyolefin shells are lightweight and easy to transport. Liners use anatomic, molded foam to increase warmth and comfort. Rossignol Fun Girl J3 junior girls' ski boots features 3 buckles and a short cuff height for small legs. Flex index of 40 is an easy flex appropriate for junior skiers.
short_description: Rossignol Fun Girl J3 junior girls' ski boots provide a comfortable fit and basic performance features for young skiers developing their skills.
